title: LA Olympics Chief Keeps Low Profile in Milan Games After Appearing in Epstein Files
summary_full: Casey Wasserman, who is leading preparations for the 2028 Summer Games, has expressed “regret” after messages he exchanged with Ghislaine Maxwell decades ago surfaced.
summary_public: Casey Wasserman, who is leading preparations for the 2028 Summer Games, has expressed “regret” after messages he exchanged with Ghislaine Maxwell decades ago surfaced.

IT.label: neutral
IT.evidence: LA Olympics Chief Keeps Low Profile in Milan Games
